name: Dad's co-worker
description:
This story is telling you about a very hot and unexpectable situation in the life of a teenage girl Manami. She had very nervous first working day in her father's office. Her dad's co-worker just wanted to help her to forget about all that stress....

“Dad's co-worker" is a nice Visual Novel featuring:

  • Different unexpectable story endings

  • Realistic backgrounds

  • Hot dialogues

  • Relaxing background music

  • Many Steam Achievements

Just make right choices and enjoy the story!
